name: Dynamic Mockups
author: Dynamic Mockups

sections.description:
Why to use this plugin?

This plugin will increase the conversion rate by showing your users how their designs will look on your products in real time by generating mockups.

How to use the plugin?

Connect the API KEY you get from your Dynamic Mockups account

Create mockup templates on your Dynamic Mockups account

In the mockup template URL you will see mockup and smart object uuids

Connect your WooCommerce product by copying mockup and smart object uuids

The generator will be shown on your connected product, upload the design and render the image
sections.installation:
Download the plugin

Activate the plugin

Go to Dynamic Mockups Website and generate FREE API KEY

Use API KEY in plugin settings and start generating mockups
sections.faq:
Can I use my PSD files?

Yes, you can use virtually any PSD file you have or you find on the internet.

Will my rendered Mockups be in High Quality?

Yes, we will always export your Mockups in Full Quality.

How long does it take to render the images?

Depends on the uploaded design size and a number of connectors attached to the product. You will get a rendered image in a seconds right after you upload the design.

Can I request a new feature?

Absolutely! We want to create the tools you need. Request a feature by sending your request to our support email or using the support page in the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Support for Simple and Variable products.
  • Get Account info in settings page.
  • Connect mockups and smart objects in product admin panel.

short_description: Dynamic Mockups helps you auto-generate product Mockups for your e-commerce store with our API and integrations.
